lyrics:
10 contributorsgetcha back lyricsinstrumental intro

verse 1
the other night they were playing our song
havent heard it for oh so long
took me back darling to that time in my car
when you cried all night cause wed gone too far

chorus
can i ever getcha back getcha back baby
gonna getcha back yeah getcha back
getcha back getcha back baby
gonna getcha back yeah getcha back
can i ever getcha back

verse 2
im getting tired layin around here at night
thinking bout some other guy holdin you tight
he may have money and a brand new car
may even treat you like a movie star
and no matter what he ever do for you
he can never love you like i can do
so if i leave her and you leave him
can we ever get back again

chorus
getcha back getcha back baby
gonna getcha back yeah getcha back
getcha back getcha back baby
gonna getcha back yeah getcha back
can i ever getcha back
you might also likeoutro
getcha back if i leave her
gonna getcha back yeah and you leave him
getcha back can we baby
gonna getcha back yeah get back again
getcha back if i leave her
gonna getcha back yeah and you leave him
getcha back can we baby
gonna getcha back yeah get back again
getcha back if i leave her
gonna getcha back yeah and you leave himembed
